price_text: The price of development varies based on its architecture and the complexity of software components.
promo_benefits: What benefits does a Promo Site provide?
benefits_online_store: What benefits does an online store provide?
benefits_corporate_site: What benefits does a corporate website provide?
benefits_business_site: What benefits does a Business Site provide?
subHeaderCorporateSite: In today's business landscape, a website is indispensable for any company. It's not just about having a presence online; the quality of your website plays a crucial role in shaping perceptions about your brand. When customers assess your business against competitors, they should have no doubt about your company's dominance in the market. We specialize in revamping existing websites and crafting new ones that enhance your position and set your company apart from the competition
subHeaderBusinessSite: In today's business landscape, a website is indispensable for any company. It's not just about having a presence online; the quality of your website plays a crucial role in shaping perceptions about your brand. When customers assess your business against competitors, they should have no doubt about your company's dominance in the market. We specialize in revamping existing websites and crafting new ones that enhance your position and set your company apart from the competition.
subHeaderLandingPage: A landing page is a website that is specifically created with the purpose of attracting visitors and motivating them to perform a specific action. The main idea of such a site is to grab the visitor's attention and convince them to complete a particular action, such as providing contact information, making a purchase, subscribing to a newsletter, requesting a consultation, etc. Such a site usually contains a minimum of navigation elements to focus the visitor's attention on the main offer and motivate them to act.
subHeaderPromoSite: Typically, creating a promotional website is a swift process, given its limited page count. You share your concept with us, endorse the design, and receive the finalized product.Even for a basic promotional site, our team injects creativity to ensure it stands out. We approach each project with zeal, avoiding cookie-cutter solutions.
subHeaderShopSite: We integrate the necessary modules and functions that encourage visitors to make additional purchases. Our goal is to make the operation of an online store easy and fast through specialized tools.Our developed solutions will speed up the process of creating an online store, significantly reducing the time to launch and start generating sales revenue.
subHeaderSupportSite: Complex and large-scale projects often require ongoing support, refinement, and enhancement to achieve their business goals.We highly value long-term and trusting relationships with our clients, which is why we consider the project's ongoing maintenance and development during its development phase.
benefits_landing_page: What benefits does a Landing Page provide?
benefits_development: Our goal is to craft a website that enhances your business using cutting-edge technologies and the expertise of our web developers. Our suite of administrative tools offers simplicity and automation, allowing you to concentrate on crucial aspects such as attracting new customers and increasing sales. Order complete website development today.
benefits_pricing: Of course, every project is unique, and it can be difficult to determine its exact cost in advance. However, our calculator will help you estimate the expenses approximately.

services_arr.text: Develop an online store for selling products with a convenient interface for your customers
Reflect the professionalism and reliability of your company in the online space, perfect for attracting new customers and strengthening your brand
Capture your audience's attention, increase your online presence with our landing pages, which will help you quickly achieve your goals and increase revenue
Take your business to the next level with business websites designed to expand your online presence
Reflect your uniqueness with our individually designed business card websites that speak volumes about you
Support and develop created and existing projects

corporateSiteTasks.text: A website creates the first impression and showcases the company’s values, enhancing its reputation in the market.
A website ensures the ability to advertise and promote your business online effectively.
Attract new customers and partners from different regions and countries, expanding your business reach.

landingPageTasks.text: Launching a landing page allows you to receive inquiries/sales faster compared to creating an online store or a business website.
A landing page is perfect for sales. The page fully focuses attention on the product or service.
With a landing page, you can launch new products or services separately from the main site, contributing to increased revenue.

promoSiteTasks.text: Your website is the initial point of contact, reflecting your company’s ethos and enhancing its reputation in the market.
A website provides a platform for online advertising and business promotion.
Websites offer comprehensive information about a company, its operations, and the services it provides.

shopSiteTasks.text: Online shopping is loved by all. There are many reasons, but agree that if you're in sales and not online, sooner or later you'll be overtaken by competitors.
Without being tied to a location. Sell products to customers from all over the country!
Think about it: by operating round the clock, a company will generate more profit than sticking to a 'From 10:00 to 19:00' schedule.

businessSiteTasks.text: Your website serves as the first point of contact, reflecting your company’s values and enhancing its reputation in the market.
Your website serves as a platform for effective online advertising and business promotion.
Expand your business by attracting new clients and partners from diverse regions and countries.

supportSiteModules.title: Enhancement of Business Logic
supportSiteModules.description: Improving usability to make the website easier and more convenient for users.

supportSiteModules.title: Redesign
supportSiteModules.description: Updating the current visual style, replacing images with higher quality ones, and refining functionality.

supportSiteModules.title: Front-end Development
supportSiteModules.description: Rectifying critical errors, optimizing the website for various browsers, screen resolutions, and devices (PCs, smartphones, tablets).

supportSiteModules.title: Refactoring
supportSiteModules.description: Technical optimization of the codebase, error fixing, and enhancing website performance (e.g., page loading speed).

supportSiteModules.title: Creation of New Features
supportSiteModules.description: Adding features such as online calculators, user-friendly order forms, galleries, social media widgets, and the ability to leave comments without registration.

supportSiteTasks.text: Ideal for projects needing support only in the first few months after launch to address bugs, administrative errors, etc.
Critical for projects requiring daily monitoring and zero operational failures. This includes e-commerce platforms, catalogs, and high-traffic websites.
Suitable for projects needing occasional tasks, periodic system updates, content updates, or adjustments to specific content blocks.

landingPageSteps.content: Create an attractive design with a clear call to action. Implement marketing strategies to attract attention.

promoSiteSteps.title: Design

shopSiteSteps.title: Prototype

shopSiteSteps.title: Design

shopSiteSteps.title: Result
shopSiteSteps.content: Launch the project with automated features, metrics, integration, and synchronization with relevant services.

businessSiteFAQ.title: What is a Business Website?
businessSiteFAQ.content: A business website is a multi-page web resource aimed at small and medium-sized businesses. It is designed to create an online image of the company, provide information about the offered services and company's capabilities, as well as attract new clients and partners.

businessSiteFAQ.title: What is the cost and timeline for creating a Business Website?
businessSiteFAQ.content: The cost and timeline for developing a Business Website are determined by several stages of work. Initially, market analysis is conducted, then the structure of sections is created, and the company's positioning is formed. Then comes the UI/UX design and programming stages. Examples of cost calculation are available in our 'cost calculator'.

businessSiteFAQ.title: What is the difference between Corporate and Business Websites?
businessSiteFAQ.content: Business websites are generally simpler in structure and contain fewer pages than corporate ones. They do not provide internal sections for registered users and are aimed at small and medium-sized businesses. Whereas corporate websites have a more complex structure with various levels of nesting and are intended for medium and large businesses.

corporateSiteFAQ.title: What is a corporate website?
corporateSiteFAQ.content: A corporate website is a multi-page resource designed for medium and large companies. It includes information about the company itself, its services, as well as data for partners and internal sections for employees.

corporateSiteFAQ.title: What is the cost and timeline for creating a corporate website?
corporateSiteFAQ.content: The cost and timeline for developing a corporate website depend on several stages of work. Initially, market analysis is conducted, then the structure of sections is created, and the company's positioning is formed. Then comes the UI/UX design and programming stages. Examples of cost calculation can be found in our 'cost calculator'.

corporateSiteFAQ.title: Why do you need a corporate website?
corporateSiteFAQ.content: The main functions of a corporate website include maintaining and improving the company's image, attracting new clients and partners, as well as optimizing some internal business processes such as lead generation, automatic mailings, and data collection and analysis.

landingPageFAQ.title: What is better: Landing page or multi-page website?
landingPageFAQ.content: If you are promoting a specific product or service, it is better to choose the creation of a landing page. This allows you to focus the user's attention on this offer, significantly increasing the likelihood of completing the desired action, whether it's a purchase, subscription, or registration.

landingPageFAQ.title: What is the cost of creating a Landing page?
landingPageFAQ.content: The cost of developing a landing page includes several stages. Initially, market analysis is conducted, then the structure of the page is created and the content is prepared. Then comes the stage of interface design and user experience (UI/UX), after which programming begins. Examples of cost calculation can be found in our 'cost calculator'.

landingPageFAQ.title: What is the timeline for creating a Landing page?
landingPageFAQ.content: The timelines depend on the complexity of the design and the number of meaningful blocks on the page. On average, creating a high-quality and stylish landing page takes from 2 to 5 weeks. Examples of timeline calculation can be seen in our 'cost calculator'.

promoSiteFAQ.title: What is a Business site?
promoSiteFAQ.content: A Business site is a multi-page web resource aimed at small and medium-sized businesses. It is oriented towards shaping the online image of the company, providing information about the company's offered services and opportunities, as well as attracting new clients and partners.

promoSiteFAQ.title: What is the cost and timeline for creating a Business site?
promoSiteFAQ.content: The cost and timeline for developing a Business site are determined by several stages of work. Initially, market analysis is conducted, then the structure of sections is created, and the company's positioning is formed. Then come the UI/UX design and programming stages. Examples of cost calculation are available in our 'cost calculator'.

promoSiteFAQ.title: What is the difference between a Corporate and a Business site?
promoSiteFAQ.content: Business sites are usually simpler in structure and contain fewer pages than corporate ones. They do not provide internal sections for registered users and are aimed at small and medium-sized businesses. While corporate sites have a more complex structure with various levels of nesting and are intended for medium and large businesses.

shopSiteFAQ.title: What is better: an online store, a catalog, or a Landing Page?
shopSiteFAQ.content: The choice between an online store, a catalog, or a Landing Page depends on the type and quantity of your products. If you have more than 10 products that can be delivered to the customer within a few days, an online store is suitable for you. If you have up to 10 products and do not plan to expand the range, a Landing Page is the optimal choice. If the products are made to order, then depending on their quantity, either a catalog or a Landing Page will be suitable.

shopSiteFAQ.title: What is the cost of developing an online store?
shopSiteFAQ.content: The cost of creating an online store is mainly determined by the required functionality. Examples of cost calculation can be found in our 'cost calculator'.

shopSiteFAQ.title: What is the timeframe for creating an online store?
shopSiteFAQ.content: The development time for an online store typically ranges from 1.5 to 8 months. This depends on the requirements for functionality, the number of products, and the need for integrations with CRM and ERP systems. Examples of timeframe calculation can be seen in our 'cost calculator'.

businessSiteStructure.pageDescription: The Home Page provides an overview of the company and directs visitors to the main sections of the site.
widgets: Brief description of services or products

businessSiteStructure.pageDescription: The 'About Us' page provides information about the company, its mission, values, and team.
The 'Services' page provides a comprehensive list of offered services with detailed descriptions.
widgets: List of all services with detailed descriptions

businessSiteStructure.pageDescription: The 'Pricing' page provides information about the cost of various service packages and special offers.
The 'Contact' page provides information on how to contact the company and the location of offices or stores.
The 'FAQ' page contains answers to the most frequently asked questions by visitors.
widgets: Links to useful articles and guides

businessSiteStructure.pageDescription: The 'Blog' page contains articles, news, and updates from the company.
The 'Careers' page provides information about current job openings and opportunities for applicants.
The 'Partners' page provides information about our partners and collaboration.
The 'Events' page contains information about upcoming and past company events.

promoSiteStructure.title: Home Page
promoSiteStructure.description: The main page of the website, designed to attract visitors' attention and present basic information about the product or service.

promoSiteStructure.title: About Us
promoSiteStructure.description: A page presenting information about the company, its history, mission, values, team, and achievements.

promoSiteStructure.title: Services
promoSiteStructure.description: A page describing the main services or products of the company, their features, and benefits.
widgets: Accordion for frequently asked questions about each service

promoSiteStructure.title: Pricing
promoSiteStructure.description: A page providing information about the prices of the company's products or services, as well as available plans and tariffs.

promoSiteStructure.title: Contact
promoSiteStructure.description: A page with the company's contact information, a feedback form, a map with location, and working hours.

promoSiteStructure.title: FAQ
promoSiteStructure.description: A page with frequently asked questions and answers to help visitors quickly find the information they need.
widgets: Video Tutorials (Video Player) for solving common problems
Lead Capture Form for obtaining additional information or subscribing to news

onlineShopStructure.title: Home Page
onlineShopStructure.description: The main page of the store designed to attract visitors' attention and provide basic information about the products or services.

onlineShopStructure.title: About Us
onlineShopStructure.description: A page presenting information about the store, its history, mission, values, and team.

onlineShopStructure.title: Product Catalog
onlineShopStructure.description: A page showcasing the complete catalog of products or services offered by the store.

onlineShopStructure.description: A page displaying selected products and providing the option to place an order.

onlineShopStructure.title: Payment and Delivery
onlineShopStructure.description: A page with information about available payment and delivery methods.

onlineShopStructure.title: Contact
onlineShopStructure.description: A page with the store's contact information, feedback form, and map location.

onlineShopStructure.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
onlineShopStructure.description: A page with frequently asked questions and answers to help visitors find the information they need quickly.
widgets: Subscription Form for receiving additional information or special offers

why_us_arr.text: A contract with clearly defined guarantees and obligations.
The ability to choose from several payment options: 70/30, 60/40, 50/50 per stage.
Communication through your preferred channels for prompt interaction.
Providing reports and interim results at each stage of work.
Training in site usage and technical support at any time.
Providing test access to familiarize yourself with site management.
Studying the specifics of your industry to create effective design.

why_us_arr.header: Individual Approach to Design and Development
why_us_arr.text: Creating unique design and optimized code tailored to your audience.
Applying technical methods to increase your site's visibility and comply with Google's requirements.
